item.title: Podcast 3: Client
item.description:
Client Side Technology includes - DHTML - Flash, Silverlight, Applets - RIA
Flash, Silverlight, Applets
Define DHTML
Code execution: Browser vs. Server
DHTML - css - javascript and VBScript - embedded vs external - toolkits: Dojo, Moshikit, Scriptaculous, YUI, Prototype, JQuery, GWT...
client-side vs server-side - speed: client way faster - Security: can view source (vs server-side scripting), ctrl+u - Compatibility: server-side produces same output no matter what, client-side has compatibility issues
RIA (Flex, OpenLaszlo)
AJAX!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Client-side development, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Flash, AJAX, and more.
item.itunes:summary:
Client Side Technology includes - DHTML - Flash, Silverlight, Applets - RIA
Flash, Silverlight, Applets
Define DHTML
Code execution: Browser vs. Server
DHTML - css - javascript and VBScript - embedded vs external - toolkits: Dojo, Moshikit, Scriptaculous, YUI, Prototype, JQuery, GWT...
client-side vs server-side - speed: client way faster - Security: can view source (vs server-side scripting), ctrl+u - Compatibility: server-side produces same output no matter what, client-side has compatibility issues
RIA (Flex, OpenLaszlo)
AJAX!!!

item.title: Podcast 2: Server
item.description:
Systems (sys admin) - Linux, Windows Server 2003, BSD
Server Software (services) - web servers - database servers - mail servers - revision - control servers - *ports
Web Server Configuration - apache, IIS
Database (dba) - MySql, SQL Server, Oracle, Postgres
Server-side Scripting - Script runs on web server, generates dynamic web page - (vs client-side, which generates dynamic content in the browser) - CGI
Web server extension modules - CGI Languages: *Perl, Python, Ruby - Web server extension modules: *PHP, ASP, ASP.NET - Java servlets
item.itunes:subtitle: Server-side development: LAMP stack (linux, apache, mysql, php), scripting languages, etc.
item.itunes:summary:
Systems (sys admin) - Linux, Windows Server 2003, BSD
Server Software (services) - web servers - database servers - mail servers - revision - control servers - *ports
Web Server Configuration - apache, IIS
Database (dba) - MySql, SQL Server, Oracle, Postgres
Server-side Scripting - Script runs on web server, generates dynamic web page - (vs client-side, which generates dynamic content in the browser) - CGI
Web server extension modules - CGI Languages: *Perl, Python, Ruby - Web server extension modules: *PHP, ASP, ASP.NET - Java servlets

item.title: Podcast 1: Introduction
item.description: - Client: Web design ( HTML, CSS, Images ), Interactivity / Browser Objects ( Flash, Flex, Laszlo, Silverlight, Java Applets / Webstart), Client-side scripting ( JavaScript, AJAX) - Server: Server-side scripting( PHP, ASP, ASP.NET, J2EE, CGI, Python, Perl, Ruby), Database, Systems Administration - Internet marketing: SEO, Accessibility, Marketing, Monitization - Extras: WYSIWYG tools, Web Frameworks ( Django, Rails ), Blogging & CMS ( WordPress, Joomla!, Drupal)
item.itunes:subtitle: Web Development Tutorials, Web Design Tutorials, Content Management Systems, and more.
item.itunes:summary: - Client: Web design ( HTML, CSS, Images ), Interactivity / Browser Objects ( Flash, Flex, Laszlo, Silverlight, Java Applets / Webstart), Client-side scripting ( JavaScript, AJAX) - Server: Server-side scripting( PHP, ASP, ASP.NET, J2EE, CGI, Python, Perl, Ruby), Database, Systems Administration - Internet marketing: SEO, Accessibility, Marketing, Monitization - Extras: WYSIWYG tools, Web Frameworks ( Django, Rails ), Blogging & CMS ( WordPress, Joomla!, Drupal)
